summary: An ordinance authorizing the execution of easements for gas mains and private water services across City property in the northeast one-quarter of Section 4, Township 23 North, Range 4 East, W. M., and in the northwest one-quarter of Section 3, Township 23 North, Range 4 East, W. M., (formerly known as Norfolk Street) to Washington Natural Gas Company and Associated Grocers' Co-op.
